text: "You Don't Know How It Feels" is a 1994 song by Tom Petty and is the lead single from his second studio album Wildflowers. It went to number 3 in Canada and was his last top 40 in the United States. ==Track listing== * "You Don't Know How It Feels" * "House in the Woods" * "Girl on LSD" * "Mary Jane's Last Dance" * "Something in the Air" ==References== Category:1994 songs Category:Tom Petty songs Category:Songs about drugs Category:Blues rock songs Category:Country rock songs Category:Folk rock songs
title: You Don't Know How It Feels
